generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, including a "BUS" marking, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible on both sides of the road, with people standing and sitting on benches.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, featuring windows, storefronts, and signs.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are mounted on poles along the street, including directional signs.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, providing shade and greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: Several people are visible on the sidewalk, including pedestrians and individuals sitting on benches.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, and a red car is visible further down the street.
- truck: A yellow truck is visible on the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right side of the sidewalk.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the right side of the road.
